comment: Mrs. Ragsdale is sweet and wants everyone to do well. She lectures in a way that is very understandable and at a good pace. I've never been good at math, but I get high B's on every test. She has bonus Wednesday's that are a couple of questions that can be added to your test scoree. There is a bit of online hw but you only have to complete 75%.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: If you struggle even the slightest in trig take her. She breaks things down to the smallest detail and she does bonus Wednesdays every week which made a big difference between passing and failing a test. There are a few homework assignments per unit which is annoying but the homework grades also help your grade tons!!! Wish I could take her again

Yeah she's awesome. Her notes are so clear an easy to follow. The material itself is not easy but she does a great job of explaining everything. Office hours were a must for me but I ended the class with an A.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: She is awesome, very helpful and will always answer questions. lots of online homework. she is clear in class and makes it simple to understand. gives good study guides but tests are difficult
Loved her! Easy class and great teacher. Go to class, none of the notes are online. Only negative is that she doesn't use D2L so no grades are posted but she teaches you how to calculate it.

Teaches a difficult subject, but does it very well. Keeps her class organized and her lectures are basically just walk-throughs of practice problems. It's helpful to attend class everyday, especially on bonus Wednesdays. MyMathLab homework due every other night, but there are only 8-15 problems that take maybe 20-30 minutes. Pay attention for an A

If you're bad at algebra, definitely take professor ragsdale! She works hard to teach you, and she's definitely there to help you, so if you need help, please ask questions and come to her office during office hours! She provides extra credit but you still have to work hard to get the grade that you deserve. ***DO THE REVIEW TESTS!!!!***

This professor is the best that I've had so far. She is very clear during class and is always there to help. The day before every test we review the chapters and she gives study guides and A LOT of extra credit. Showing up to class is a big help. I hope to take her again!
The assignments are easy, but you don't get reminded to complete them. Just do your homework and show up to class.

Honestly, she wasn't my favorite teacher in the world, but she's manageable. She isn't completely clear, and has a bit of an irritating sassy side at times.  Sit at the front of the room. She doesn't really answer questions fully either. She's not a bad teacher, and she can be sweet at times. Bonus Wednesdays are amazing though.

Amazing teacher! She gives very clear instructions and gives plenty of bonus points whenever she can. She always tries to make time to help students. She can as long as you attend her class and look over the notes you'll get a passing grade. If you want that A you will just have to try a bit harder than usually and actually do all her practice test

Really amazing teacher! Only 4 tests and a final! There are so many extra credit oppurtunities. HW is unlimited tries. Before tests are review sessions that help. Even if you dont do well on a text, the bonus Wednesdays can push ur grade up! Take her!

Calculus is hard, noway around that; however, if you want a teacher that is willing to do everything in their power for you to succeed, then take professor Ragsdale. She is probable the best teach I have had at KSU and I hate math! I got a C in her class because I stink at math but I came out her class knowing a lot more than when I cam in...
She is a very awesome person, but her test is can be difficult. I advise you to sit in the front of class and be active. Bonus Wednesdays are a blessing, take advantage of it.
Very nice lady. "Bonus Wednesdays" are like quizzes, but points earned go towards your tests. Reviews are really helpful. Kind of a fast paced class, but is always willing to go over things!

Very nice teacher who makes calculus easy to follow and understand. Test reviews on my math lab are extra credit and she makes them very similar to her tests. Gives bonus extra credit quizzes every week. 4 tests and a final. Lowest test grade can be replaced by the final. She gives you everything you need and more in order to make an A. Take her!

Prof Ragsdale was awesome! I have always been good at math, but she's one of the best teachers I've ever had. She gives bonus points on certain days where you answer questions from previous lectures and those points go towards your tests. Test reviews were extra credit too. She always goes over anything you need her to clarify. TAKE HER!

Professor Ragsdale was a very caring professor. I've always been good at math, but calculus wasn't the easiest class. Attendance wasn't mandatory, but in order to understand the majority of the material, I would suggest going to class. She bumped my grade from an 89 to an A at the end of the semester
very helpful i love her best math teacher ever she gave the hopeless hope come to class do the homework and you''ll pass tests are just like practice tests take her she''s awesome

Do ALL the homework on my math lab, the practice helps a lot for tests. She is really nice and wants you to do well, so she gives a lot of extra credit. I don't like math at all and I'm not good at it, so the fact I made an A is a miracle.
Great Prof! She is thoughtful, kind, extremely helpful and gives extra credit. Class moves kind of fast but she is willing to help whenever possible.

Prof Ragsdale is so sweet and helpful. Class participation, plenty of extra credit, and thorough instruction. It is easy  to pass this class especially with this Prof. Do the work and review, and for sure, you will not fail.

Thorough lectures and notes given in class. Two quizzes for each test and each quiz is very helpful studying for the test. Must have code to MyMathLab. Homework is extremely easy/helpful.Cumulative final. Very sweet, nice professor that is willing to spend time helping students. It is your fault if you don't get an A in her class.
Everyone else has basically covered it. If you get the chance before her classes fill up, take her. Very kind, patient and knowledgable.

TAKE HER IF YOU CAN! Shes the best math professor at Kennesaw! She really cares about her students grades and does everything to help you succeed. It's impossible to not make an A or B. extra credit is thrown at you! 10 extra points on every quiz! take her if you can!

best professor i have ver had. She is very nice and easy to understand. she will take the time and effort to make sure you know material and is a very sweet lady. I wish i could have her for every class.
Really good teacher and really easy class! Didn't use the textbook at all but needed the code to get onto My Math Lab. Shes really nice and helpful.

Would highly recommend her. She is by far the nicest and best professor I've had. The way she teaches is very clear and easy to understand. She's very ready to help any of her students. Easily got an A in her class.

Professor Ragsdale is WONDERFUL. Attendance is necessary, her tests and quizzes are straight from things we learn in class. But I have missed a few classes and still have an A. She's very clear and always willing to help. She teaches you the easiest way to go about solving problems. LOVE HER. So sweet, also.
i love mrs ragsdale. awesome teacher. corny but funny. walks you completely through every little step.

I think she is a good teacher and gives a lot of things to help you prepare for the test. She goes a little fast in her "notes" which is really examples but they are helpful while doing the homework. I would take her again.

SUCH a great teacher. Great sense of humor, and even though she goes fast, she's a great teacher. Wants to help you succeed and provides lots of opportunities for bonus points. Easy and fun. MUST TAKE.

I actually enjoyed this class. While there was nothing particularly interesting about it, Ragsdale does a great job of helping her students understand all information and answers all questions. She is very nice and often times offers opportunities to enhance grades. TAKE THIS PROFESSOR IF YOU CAN!

Professor Ragsdale is a little "rusty" when it comes to teaching, but if you do her Math Labs, you should be fine. She doesn't totally grade my her syllabus, which is unfortunate. But I received an A.
Great teacher. She really wants you to understand the material. The material is somewhat hard but she is very helpful. She also lets you use calculators.

She is a great prof.!! The textbook in opitional but the homework is online. Attendance is not mandatory but its extra credit. 8 quizes, 4 tests, and a final but they are all so easy! She is very helpful. Take her!!!

"I don't need to work, I do this for fun only" is what she said first day of class! I'd recommend her spends sometimes and learn about computer. She makes students to practice online such as homework and etc. then tests are always on the paper because "She is not a technology person". The in class teaching is super fast, hard to catch up with her.
AWESOME PROF! She is super nice and helpful. Book homework optional. There were homeowrk quizzes pretty often, and she gave 10 bonus points on all of them. Tests were easy. Easy A

Great professor. Very nice and helpful. If you don't understand something, don't hesitate to speak up and ask because she'll explain it in great detail to you. Adds bonus points to every quiz. Overall, GREAT teacher. Definitely recommend her!!

Ragsdale is one of the best math teachers ever. On every test at least 5 bonus pts are automatically added and 1 bonus pt on every quiz. She replaces a quiz with your attendance and also replaces your final with your lowest test grade. Its impossible to fail. GREAT TEACHER!!! (PS dont buy book)

The tests are pretty easy. Online homework is mandatory, but usually only 10-15 questions. If you're like me and don't like being called on in class do NOT take her cause she seems to enjoy doing that. Overall not a bad professor, but probably wouldn't take her again.
She is great! Soo easy. HW online is mandatory but the book work isnt so dont buy the book. Every test and quiz has extra credit and she is soo willing to help people.

I ABSOLUTELY LOVVVEEEDDDD HER. She is really sweet and will go out of her way to help you. every test and quiz has extra credit. Attendance not mandatory but i reccomend going bc you get extra credit for it, and you will mmiss a lot if you miss class. i made an A. I LOVE LOVE LOVE her and would take her again if i could. Best professor at KSU!!!!!!

I took her for College Algebra and loved her! I wish she could teach every subject. She's the best professor I've had at KSU. She's very helpful and will meet with you outside of class whenever you need help. I'd advise you to take her. She's the best.

I love Mrs. Ragsdale! She is such a great teacher. I am usually really bad at math but she makes it very understandable. Make sure you go to class, because she can tend to go kind of fast on things. Also, she is happy to answer or go over any question or problem you may have. I highly recommend taking her.

Do not like her. she goes way too fast and assumes you know things.Big mistake taking her. I learned more from teaching myself and having a tutor. She knows the material but does not deliver well in my opinion. Also she goes over new material BEFORE a test on old material...which confuse most people. Would NOT recommend

Do not llike her at all. She goes way too fast and seems to be agitated sometimes when you ask a question. She teaches and assumes you know what she knows. Went by previous reviews when i chose her class...BIG mistake

Great teacher. Online homework required, book homework not required. Tests always have bonuses. Always takes the time to explain something if you don't understand. Recommend. Don't buy the book unless you plan to do the extra homework, which is good practice, but you can always practice with the online homework also.

4 tests and a final, some quizzes on the chapters, and a lot of homework; online (graded) and out of the book (not graded).  Gauge how much personal homework to do by how well you do on the quizzes.  I got by doing only the online homework and got an A.   She teaches well enough, but make sure you ask questions if you don't understand something.
I loved this class! She is amazing! I made a 99 and I didnt ever study! She is super nice & very easy to understand! I recommend this teacher!

best math teacher i have ever had! i am horrible at math and i have an A. she is extremely nice and helpful and makes all of the tests and quizs really easy. the only homework is mathxl and you dont even have to do all of it.

Amazing, she is so nice. You have online HW but book HW is not required..no real point in buying it at all.  Tests and quizzes are ridiculously easy!  Just take notes and go to class, everything has built in extra credit, attendance grade will replace a bad quiz grade, and if your final is higher than a test she'll replace the grade with the higher

VERY good prof! If you pay attention and take notes it's an easy A! There is a quiz every week but you have a chance to get extra credit on each one! Nothing unexpected is on the tests if you do the homework she assigns. She was great!
